title: Good Product, works well
content: I am diligent when it comes to using a refrigerated caffeine eye serum in the morning to help de-puff and revive my eyes.ˀˀ I had gone through two bottles of a different caffeine eye serum before splurging on this. This is formulated with slightly less caffeine but feels more elegant (less filmy) and absorbs better!
